message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can end the game early!
I'll start with a strong offer, Alice. Will you accept?
A bit more balanced this time, Bob. Will you accept?
You're getting closer, Alice. But I think I can do better than that!
Getting closer to the endgame, Bob. Will you take this deal?
I'm not going to let you take advantage of me, Alice. I'm making a strong counteroffer!
Last chance, Bob. Will you take this deal and end this game?
I'm not going to give up now, Alice. I'll take a small chance and make another offer.
It's almost over, Bob. I'll give you a small consolation prize. Will you accept?
I'm not going to leave with nothing, Alice. I'll make one last push for a better deal.
It's almost over, Bob. I'll give you a tiny bit of money. Will you accept?
I'll take what's left, Alice. It's not much, but it's better than nothing.
